summary: A fast test suite that validates the core behavior of a music generation diffusion pipeline, checking component setup, input handling, attention slicing, batch inference consistency, audio duration, sampling strategies, negative prompts and their embeddings, waveform count per prompt, prompt embedding integration, vocoder dimensionality, data type conversion, and optimized attention mechanisms.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and performance of the music generation pipeline to support reliable audio creation services and accelerate product development by catching regressions early.
